metadata.title: CVE-2015-1326 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
python-dbusmock before version 0.15.1 AddTemplate() D-Bus method call orDBusTestCase.spawn_server_template() method could be tricked into executingmalicious code if an attacker supplies a .pyc file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1326` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-dbusmock - 0.10.1-1ubuntu1
python3-dbusmock - 0.10.1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-dbusmock package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.1-1ubuntu1').
